alert.note: Alert for Anson; Stanly (North Carolina) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.headline: Severe Thunderstorm Warning issued July 06 at 7:57PM EDT until July 06 at 9:00PM EDT by NWS Raleigh
info.description: The National Weather Service in Raleigh has issued a * Severe Thunderstorm Warning for... Western Anson County in central North Carolina... Southern Stanly County in central North Carolina... * Until 900 PM EDT. * At 756 PM EDT, severe thunderstorms were located along a line extending from near Midland to near Wingate to near Buford, moving southeast at 15 mph. HAZARD...60 mph wind gusts. SOURCE...Radar indicated. IMPACT...Expect damage to roofs, siding, and trees. * Locations impacted include... Ansonville, Polkton, Locust, Norwood, Oakboro, Stanfield, Peachland, White Store and Lake Tillery. HAIL THREAT...RADAR INDICATED MAX HAIL SIZE...<.75 IN WIND THREAT...RADAR INDICATED MAX WIND GUST...60 MPH
info.instruction: Straight line winds can blow down trees, power lines, and damage mobile homes and other buildings. Seek shelter in a sturdy structure until the storm has passed. Stay away from windows as flying debris generated by damaging winds can be deadly.
